'Lesotho' ( ), officially the 'Kingdom of Lesotho', is a landlocked country and
enclave, completely surrounded by its only neighbouring country, South Africa.
It is just over in size and has a population slightly over two million. Its capital and largest city is Maseru. Lesotho is a member of
the Commonwealth of Nations. The name Lesotho translates roughly into the land
of the people who speak [[Sotho language|Sesotho]]. About 40% of the
population live below the international poverty line of US $1.25 a
day. [http://hdr.undp.org/en/media/HDI_2008_EN_Tables.pdf Human Development
Indices], Table 3: Human and income poverty, p. 35. Retrieved on 1 June
2009
